class.name: rviz/Axes
class.description: Displays an axis at the Target Frame's origin. More Information.

class.name: rviz/DepthCloud
class.description: Displays point clouds based on depth maps. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Effort
class.description: Displays from sensor_msgs/JointState/effort messages.

class.name: rviz/FluidPressure
class.description: Displays from sensor_msgs/FluidPressure messages.

class.name: rviz/Grid
class.description: Displays a grid along the ground plane, centered at the origin of the target frame of reference. More Information.

class.name: rviz/GridCells
class.description: Displays data from a nav_msgs::GridCells message as billboards. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Illuminance
class.description: Displays illuminance values from a sensor_msgs/Illuminance topic. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Image
class.description: Displays an image from a sensor_msgs/Image topic, similar to image_view. More Information.

class.name: rviz/InteractiveMarkers
class.description: Connects to one or more Interactive Marker servers, allowing you to interact with the provided 3D objects. More Information.

class.name: rviz/LaserScan
class.description: Displays the data from a sensor_msgs::LaserScan message as points in the world, drawn as points, billboards, or cubes. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Map
class.description: Displays an occupancy grid on the ground plane from a nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Marker
class.description: Displays visualization_msgs::Marker messages. More Information.

class.name: rviz/MarkerArray
class.description: Displays visualization_msgs::MarkerArray messages without presuming the topic name ends in "_array". More Information.

class.name: rviz/Odometry
class.description: Accumulates and displays poses from a nav_msgs::Odometry message. More Information

class.name: rviz/Path
class.description: Displays data from a nav_msgs::Path message as lines. More Information.

class.name: rviz/PointStamped
class.description: Displays from geometry_msgs/PointStamped message

class.name: rviz/PointCloud
class.description: Displays a point cloud from a sensor_msgs::PointCloud message as points in the world, drawn as points, billboards, or cubes. More Information.

class.name: rviz/PointCloud2
class.description: Displays a point cloud from a sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 message as points in the world, drawn as points, billboards, or cubes. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Polygon
class.description: Displays data from a geometry_msgs::PolygonStamped message as lines. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Pose
class.description: Displays a geometry_msgs::PoseStamped message. More Information.

class.name: rviz/PoseArray
class.description: Displays the poses from a geometry_msgs::PoseArray message as a cloud of arrows on the ground plane. More Information

class.name: rviz/PoseWithCovariance
class.description: Displays a geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped message. More Information.

class.name: rviz/Range
class.description: Displays the data from sensor_msgs::Range messages as cones. More Information

class.name: rviz/RelativeHumidity
class.description: Displays the data from sensor_msgs::RelativeHumidity.

class.name: rviz/RobotModel
class.description: Displays a visual representation of a robot in the correct pose (as defined by the current TF transforms). More Information.

class.name: rviz/Camera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. More Information.

class.name: rviz/XYZ
class.description: Transforms the point cloud data into XYZ coordinates to position each point.

class.name: rviz/Intensity
class.description: Transforms the color of each point based on its "intensity" value.

class.name: rviz/RGB8
class.description: Sets the color of each point based on RGB8 data.

class.name: rviz/MONO8
class.description: Sets the mono color of each point based on RGB8 data.

class.name: rviz/RGBF32
class.description: Sets the color of each point based on RGBF32 data.

class.name: rviz/FlatColor
class.description: Sets the color of each point to be a single flat color.

class.name: rviz/AxisColor
class.description: Sets the color of each point based on its position along one of the X, Y, or Z axes.

class.name: rviz/Temperature
class.description: Displays from sensor_msgs/Temperature message

class.name: rviz/TF
class.description: Displays the TF transform hierarchy. More Information.

class.name: rviz/WrenchStamped
class.description: Displays from geometry_msgs/WrenchStamped message

class.name: rviz/PublishPoint
class.description: Allows you to click on a point and publish it as a PointStamped message.

class.name: rviz/FocusCamera
class.description: Click onto any object to focus the camera there.

class.name: rviz/Measure
class.description: Click onto two locations to measure their distance.

class.name: rviz/MoveCamera
class.description: Drag the mouse with left, middle, or right buttons to change your viewpoint.

class.name: rviz/Select
class.description: Drag with the left button to select objects in the 3D scene. Hold the Alt key to change viewpoint as in the Move tool.

class.name: rviz/SetGoal
class.description: Publish a goal pose for the robot. After one use, reverts to default tool.

class.name: rviz/SetInitialPose
class.description: Publish an initial pose for the robot. After one use, reverts to default tool.

class.name: rviz/Interact
class.description: Interact with interactive markers. Mouse actions not on interactive markers fall back to moving the camera.

class.name: rviz/Orbit
class.description: Makes it easy to move around a given point in space, looking at it from any angle.

class.name: rviz/XYOrbit
class.description: Makes it easy to move around a given point on the XY plane, looking at it from any angle.

class.name: rviz/ThirdPersonFollower
class.description: Follow a target frame and turn the viewing direction with the yaw of the target frame.

class.name: rviz/FPS
class.description: Control the camera like in a First Person Shooter game: drag left to look left, etc.

class.name: rviz/TopDownOrtho
class.description: Orthographic projection, seen from the top.
